languages.text: "Но если Немезит врет про Лорд-капитана, может, и об остальном тоже?! Может, и не друг он нам, и не заступник?!"
"But if Nemesite is lying about the Lord Captain, maybe he's lying about other things, too. What if he's not our champion at all?"
languages.original_text: "Но если Немезит врет про Лорд-капитана, может, и об остальном тоже?! Может, и не друг он нам, и не заступник?!"

traits.locale_text: "But if Nemesite is lying about the Lord Captain, maybe he is lying about everything else, too. What if he is not our champion after all?!"
"But if Nemesite is lying about the Lord Captain, maybe he is lying about everything else, too. What if he is not our champion after all?!"
"But if Nemesite is lying about the Lord Captain, maybe he is lying about everything else, too. What if he is not our champion after all?"
"But if Nemesite is lying about the Lord Captain, maybe he is lying about everything else, too. What if he is not our champion after all?"
"But if Nemesite is lying about the Lord Captain, maybe he's lying about other things, too. What if he's not our champion at all?"
"But if Nemesite is lying about the Lord Captain, maybe he's lying about other things, too. What if he's not our champion at all?"

languages.text: "Aber wenn Nemesit Lügen über den Lord Captain erzählt, lügt er vielleicht bei anderen Dingen auch. Was ist, wenn er gar nicht unser Streiter ist?"
languages.original_text: "But if Nemesite is lying about the Lord Captain, maybe he's lying about other things, too. What if he's not our champion at all?"

traits.locale_text: "Aber wenn Nemesit Lügen über den Lord Captain erzählt, lügt er vielleicht bei anderen Dingen auch. Was ist, wenn er gar nicht unser Streiter ist?"

languages.text: «Pues si Nemesitio miente sobre {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán, a ver si lo demás tampoco va a ser cierto. ¿Y si al final resulta que no es nuestro campeón?».
languages.original_text: "But if Nemesite is lying about the Lord Captain, maybe he's lying about other things, too. What if he's not our champion at all?"

traits.locale_text: «Pues si Nemesitio miente sobre {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán, a ver si lo demás tampoco va a ser cierto. ¿Y si al final resulta que no es nuestro campeón?».

languages.text: 「でもネメサイトのロード・キャプテンの話が嘘なら、他のことも嘘かもしれない。もし彼が我々の王者じゃなければどうなる？」
languages.original_text: "But if Nemesite is lying about the Lord Captain, maybe he's lying about other things, too. What if he's not our champion at all?"

traits.locale_text: 「でもネメサイトのロード・キャプテンの話が嘘なら、他のことも嘘かもしれない。もし彼が我々の王者じゃなければどうなる？」

languages.text: “但既然涅墨斯特在舰长大人的事情上撒了谎，那说不定他在别的方面也撒了谎吧？万一他根本就不是我们的勇士呢？”
languages.original_text: "But if Nemesite is lying about the Lord Captain, maybe he's lying about other things, too. What if he's not our champion at all?"

traits.locale_text: “但既然涅墨斯特在舰长大人的事情上撒了谎，那说不定他在别的方面也撒了谎吧？万一他根本就不是我们的勇士呢？”

languages.text: « Mais alors... si Némésite ment à propos {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, peut-être bien qu'il nous a menti pour le reste aussi. Si ça se trouve, c'est pas du tout notre champion ! »
languages.original_text: "But if Nemesite is lying about the Lord Captain, maybe he's lying about other things, too. What if he's not our champion at all?"

traits.locale_text: « Mais alors... si Némésite ment à propos {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, peut-être bien qu'il nous a menti pour le reste aussi. Si ça se trouve, c'est pas du tout notre champion ! »

languages.text: "İyi de Nemezit, Lord Kaptan hakkında yalan konuşuyorsa diğer dedikleri de yalan olmasın? Ya o bizim müdafimiz değilse?"
languages.original_text: "But if Nemesite is lying about the Lord Captain, maybe he's lying about other things, too. What if he's not our champion at all?"
